description: This is a modern 'Pods View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features (8.x.x). GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

panels.description: Shows how many times was particular alert started in a defined time range. Alert can be started either directly as `firing` or as a `pending`. Pending alerts wait for a defined time before it flips to a `firing` alert. This is specified with the `FOR` clause in a Prometheus `rules` file.
panels.title: Alert Details

title: Kubernetes / Views / Pods
